Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem near Kedzie. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem near Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
